name: Sir, your Armor is melting
description:
Pick up the ice cube on the left and drop it into the volcano on the right. Repeat. Beware of falling rocks.

Controls:

  • MOVE: WASD / Arrows / Left Stick
  • RUN: Shift / Left Trigger / West (X)
  • JUMP: Space / South (A)
  • PICK UP / THROW Ice Cube: E / CTRL / North (Y)

Third Party Stuff:

  • Unity standard third person character controller & animations

Changelog:

  • 2022-04-07:
    • Added "E" key for picking up / throwing ice cube
    • Added controls to title screen
    • Fixed collider issue with falling rocks
